villa.name: Nomads Hideaway
villa.tagline: Your Base Camp in the South
villa.description: Unlike isolated tourist hotels, Nomads Hideaway is located in a real Sri Lankan neighborhood. You get the peace of a private garden villa with unmatched connectivity.
villa.fullDescription: Priyanka and Lionel created Nomads Hideaway to share their love for Sri Lankan hospitality. Whether you need local tips or fresh fruit from the garden, they are here to make your stay unforgettable.

location.address: 87A Lumbini, Rahula Road, Matara 81000, Sri Lanka

railway.name: Matara Railway Station
railway.description: The train is your gateway to the entire island.

beaches.name: Polhena Beach
beaches.description: Calm waters protected by a reef. Famous for Swimming with Sea Turtles. Perfect for snorkeling.

beaches.name: Madiha Beach
beaches.description: The hip 'Surfer's Village'. Excellent coffee shops, local vibes, and quality surf breaks for intermediates.

beaches.name: SK Town Beach
beaches.description: A hidden gem with quiet, vast sandy shores. Excellent for Beginner Surfing without crowds.

beaches.name: Mirissa
beaches.description: Famous for Whale Watching and vibrant nightlife. Sunset cocktails at Coconut Tree Hill are legendary.

beaches.name: Weligama Bay
beaches.description: The 'Capital of Learning to Surf'. Gentle long waves and home to the iconic Stilt Fishermen. Perfect for learners.

beaches.name: Hiriketiya
beaches.description: A stunning horseshoe bay with jungle vibes. Hip cafes, yoga studios, and a very relaxed bohemian atmosphere.

beaches.name: Talalla Beach
beaches.description: A quiet and secluded beach with dramatic cliff views. Perfect for those seeking peace and pristine natural beauty.

beaches.name: Duwili Ulpatha Beach
beaches.description: A lesser-known pristine beach with golden sand and calm waters. Ideal for swimming and beach picnics away from tourists.

beaches.name: Matara Beach
beaches.description: Your closest beach! Scenic coastal views with local restaurants and calm morning swims. Great for sunrise walks.

partners.name: RideXHub
partners.description: Explore Sri Lanka on two wheels! We've partnered with RideXHub to offer our guests exclusive discounts on hassle-free, deposit-free bike rentals with free home delivery to your villa.

partners.name: Matara Spice
partners.description: Authentic Sri Lankan spices sourced from our family business. Bring home the essence of Sri Lanka: premium cinnamon, black pepper, cloves, cardamom, nutmeg, and much more.

reviews.heading: What Our Guests Say
reviews.description: Authentic reviews from travelers who've experienced Nomads Hideaway. Read verified reviews from Booking.com, Airbnb, and more.
